title: Free the artist
tags: how to unlock free the artist

25 Sleight of Hand). You may then use it to burn the painting in the atelier’s secret room. Afterwards, head back to the room where Jannath and Oskar are to decide the latter’s fate.

Free the Artist Objectives

Help Oskar escape.

We met Oskar, an artist captured by the Zhentarim. He begged us to help him escape, promising that his patron will reward us handsomely. Oskar told us his story. Caught up in a romantic scandal with a patriar of Baldur's Gate, he'd fled his engagement to her. Brem agr
